description: Table that holds coverage information for an adjudication. Adjudication records are used by Ambulatory Pharmacy during prescription copay adjudication.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the adjudication record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the coverage for which the adjudication record was created.

columns.name: TX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Transaction Type category ID of the adjudication message


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Bill (B1)


Reversal (B2)


Rebill (B3)


Eligibility (E1)


Authorization


Cancellation


Claim


Information Reporting (N1)

columns.name: PAYOR_SHEET_ID
columns.description: The payor sheet that is used during adjudication. Each time an adjudication occurs on a prescription the payor sheet to use is determined based on setup in the payor and plan records.

columns.name: PAYOR_SHEET_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of this payor sheet

columns.name: ACTION_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: Date and time when the adjudication action was performed on the prescription fill.
